sentence.value: Despite what he later called "the best flying job in the world", Engle decided to apply again to NASA as he expected to be rotated to another Air Force assignment within a year and hoped to go to the Moon.

sentence.value: On July 21, 2001, Engle was enshrined at Dayton, Ohio, in the National Aviation Hall of Fame class of 2001, along with USAF ace Robin Olds, Marine Corps ace Marion Carl, and Albert Ueltschi.
sentence.annotated-sentence: null
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: null

sentence.value: He is currently an aerospace and sporting goods consultant, and continues an active flying career in high performance aircraft.
